short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steals buttons from the websites you visit. Do your usual online stuff and watch the collection of stolen buttons grow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Button Stealer "steals" buttons from the websites you visit. Do your usual everyday online stuff and watch the collection of your stolen buttons grow. It’s fun, useless, and free! Button Stealer works locally and doesn’t send data anywhere, so your data remains private.
